title: BEAUTIFUL RENOVATED STUDIO IN PACKARDS CORNER! NO FEE!
posting_body: This unit was completely gutted down to the studs less than two years ago.
It's on the 4th floor and gets Sunny Southern Exposure through the Harvey Windows.
New natural red oak flooring was installed.
There is a Large French Double Door Closet.
New electrical wiring was installed and there are plenty of outlets in all of the rooms.
New stainless steel appliances were installed in the kitchen including a dishwasher, built-in microwave, refrigerator, and an electric range.
The Shaker Style cabinets are really nice with soft close drawers and polished nickel hardware.
Thee are beautiful granite counter tops and white subway tiles for the backsplash.
The bathroom has White Italian Carrera
Marble Basketweave tile on the floor.
There is also an exhaust fan and a window in the bathroom.
Owner requires 1st month's rent and 1 month security deposit.
Apartment is availaboe for a 9/1 lease start date.
Please come take a look before this place gets rented.
Heat and hot water are included.
There are four washing machines and four dryers in the basement of the building.
Only 1st month and 1 month security deposit are required to move in.
Choose between Xfinity and Starry for all of your high speed internet and cable requirements.
Nice Brick Building in Packard's Corner.
Building is on the Allston/Brookline line.
